main event: A saucer-shaped object approximately 50 feet in diameter was observed in flight over Colebrook, New Hampshire in June 1957.
interesting points: The object was silvery-white and flew at an altitude of about 6,000 feet., It was traveling at an estimated speed of over 500 mph., The object was tracked by observers for a distance of approximately 50 miles., A thorough investigation was conducted by the U.S. Air Force, and no satisfactory explanation was found., The Air Force continues its investigation into the unidentified object.
